name: Dr. Ananya Sharma
longDescription: Dr. Ananya Sharma has over 10 years of experience helping children with dyslexia improve reading and learning skills through tailored programs and one-on-one coaching.

name: Mr. Rahul Mehta
shortDescription: Certified ADHD coach for teens and young adults.
longDescription: Rahul Mehta specializes in executive functioning and behavioral strategies for managing ADHD. He offers both in-person and online coaching for students and professionals.

name: Ms. Priya Nair
longDescription: Priya Nair is an educational therapist with a focus on literacy support for children with dyslexia. She uses evidence-based approaches to improve phonemic awareness and comprehension.

name: Dr. Akshay Kapoor
shortDescription: Holistic ADHD support for working professionals.
longDescription: Dr. Kapoor combines coaching, mindfulness, and productivity techniques to help adults with ADHD improve their personal and professional lives.

name: Mrs. Neha Joshi
shortDescription: Remedial educator with a focus on early intervention.
longDescription: With a background in special education, Neha Joshi helps young learners with dyslexia build foundational reading and writing skills through structured programs.
